name: Hanger World
detailed_description:
Awesome ragdoll swinging action with crazy physics!! BUT DON'T LOSE YOUR BODY PARTS! :)

• SWING your ragdoll through dangerous levels filled with razor sharp spikes, buzz saws, lethal lasers, hungry monsters and all sorts of limb cutting obstacles!

• CREATE your own levels and share them with your friends!

FEATURES


• 100+ Hanger killing levels!
• Level Editor! Create and share your levels with others!
• Speedrun Mode on all levels - Get the best time!
• Unlock cool rewards for your Hanger!
• Powered by state of the art Ragdoll Limb Cutting Technology™!
• Swing around like a Stickman Ragdoll Spider Man!
• Music by Boy vs Bacteria!

THE HISTORY OF HANGER


From hugely successful flash games with millions of plays to featured mobile games with millions of downloads and now back to desktop again - The Hanger games has had great success on every platform that they've been released on so far and now Hanger World is finally coming to Steam!



Keep on Swingin'!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 8, Windows 7, Vista, or XP
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any graphics card that supports OpenGL 2.1
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
